main event: A U.S. Coast Guard radar witness reported observing a white object with a blue overtone that moved from South to North at high speed, believed to have fallen into swamps.
interesting points: The object was reported to have split in half and disappeared,The object was observed by a U.S. Coast Guard radar operator,The object was described as disc-shaped,The sighting occurred on March 31, 1957, in Brunswick, Georgia,The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a disc-shaped object white in color with a blue overtone
